var callToApi=function callToApi(houseFilter){return fetch("http://hp-api.herokuapp.com/api/characters/house/".concat(houseFilter)).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(data){var cleanData=data.map(function(character,index){return{id:index,// id: character.actor + character.name,
image:character.image,name:character.name,specie:character.species,alive:character.alive,gender:character.gender,house:character.house};});console.log(data);return cleanData;});};export default callToApi;
